pages.text: $(o)When traveling around, the night can get quite dark and dangerous. But setting up a bed for the night is not an optimal choice, since that resets your respawn location. That is where Comforts come in.

pages.title: SLEEPING BAG
pages.text: $(o)Sleeping Bags enable you to sleep without resetting your respawn location. No need to wait out the night if you are far from base.
